name: Night Terror (florian.briese, Friedrich-Albert-Lange Berufskolleg, YannickS, Tim_ZurParty, DarkLightningx3, f2abianski, chonki, MagicMax)
name_original: Night Terror (florian.briese, Friedrich-Albert-Lange Berufskolleg, YannickS, Tim_ZurParty, DarkLightningx3, f2abianski, chonki, MagicMax)
description:
Dear diary,
my servant was away all day and left me starving. When he finally got home he didn't pay attention to me. The filthy human wasn't even able to walk straight. My bowl is still empty and my servant went to sleep. This careless behaviour may not be unpunished. He will not get away with this as long as his paws are under my roof!
